snippet.sync_client:
from seed.client import SeedBytes

client = SeedBytes(
    base_url="https://yourhost.com/path/to/api",
)
client.service.upload()
snippet.async_client:
from seed.client import AsyncSeedBytes

client = AsyncSeedBytes(
    base_url="https://yourhost.com/path/to/api",
)
await client.service.upload()
